page.title: 13BOY'S BRIGADE
page.content: { BOY'S BRIGADE} Every Tuesday we meet at Hinckley Baptist Church at 6.15.Our uniform is blue jumper,black trousers and black shoes.On the jumper we have a badge with an anchor ,a red cross and our motto 'Sure and Steadfast'. We play games like beanbag Hockey or Football.We also work for badges we need to do eight things for each badge. We also haves badges to show how long we have been in Boy's Brigade. You can join Boy's Brigade at six years and be in the Anchor Boys, at eight you join the junior section then at eleven you join the company until you are sixteen,when you may become an officer. We sometimes go away for weekends, we have a band ,we go on parade once a month. I like Boy's Brigade.
